metadata.NOTE: I never post warnings on films, and its not my job to censor any film. Please be aware this film centres on a 12 year old who becomes a prostitute. The film isn’t particularly graphic, but theres one shot which some people might take issue with. If you think you might take issue with any shot from this film, please just close this tab now… or check out some other films from Malle or Nykvist.
